sentences.sentence: They break routines, because "autopilot is death".
sentences.translation: 他们打破了常规，因为“自动驾驶就是死亡”。

sentences.sentence: Those products have rightly been stopped in accordance with our safety routines.
sentences.translation: 根据我们的安全惯例，停止使用那些产品是正确的。

sentences.sentence: The Pandemic will take lives, strangle economies and destroy routines, but it will pass.
sentences.translation: 大流行病将夺去生命、扼杀经济、打破常规，但它终将会过去。
